welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ballymoney, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom. Known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. We hope you enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ballykelly Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eglinton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aldergrove International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Aldergrove International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
